1232.question: Do the authors give any examples of major events which draw the public's attention and the impact they have on stock price?

2-Figure2-1.png: Yes, the authors provide an example of the 'March 2020 coronavirus crash', where the stock price of Tesla dropped by 30% in a week due to the public's attention drawn to the company's production of ventilators.</s>
Yes, the authors provide an example of the 'March 2020 coronavirus pandemic', which drew significant public attention and had a noticeable impact on the stock price.</s>
